title: Let‚Äôs Break The Internet: ChatGPT API + Notion Infinite Tweet Generator
description:
Someone was bound to build this so it might as well be us. 
In this video we create an infinite tweet generator with the ChatGPT API and Notion using Python.
Buckle up - we're about to break the internet.

Feel free to ask any questions! Let me know what you think about this video style and let me know if you'd like me to share the source code as we continue to build out this application from a simple Python app to a fully hosted, automated, auto-generating, scheduled app.

Stay focused.
Keep Building.
